subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A night after his 3-point bonanza, Deron Williams was a modest 5 of 13 from the field, but he calmly and efficiently led the Nets to a win over the Hawks.
snippet: A night after his 3-point bonanza, Deron Williams was a modest 5 of 13 from the field, but he calmly and efficiently led the Nets to a win over the Hawks.
